issue_title: [Enhancement] 添加 load/save 操作的日志记录

implementation.description: Added optional logging.Logger parameter to TodoStorage class for debugging file operations
key_changes: Added optional logger parameter to TodoStorage.__init__
load() logs DEBUG message with file path and entry count when logger provided
save() logs DEBUG message with file path and entry count when logger provided
Default behavior unchanged (no logging when logger=None)

risks.performance_impact: None - logging is optional and only evaluated when logger is provided
limitations: Only DEBUG level logging implemented as per issue requirements
